name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
teaser: Ten thousand gates to the realm of foxes
shortStory: Since 711 AD, pilgrims have walked these vermillion tunnels up Mount Inari. Each of the 10,000 torii gates was donated by a business seeking prosperity, creating a path that blurs the line between the mortal and spirit worlds.
bullets: Dedicated to Inari, the god of rice
Fox statues guard the sacred path
